snp5.1:1.1: From the fair city of the Kosalans
snp5.1:1.3: came a brahmin expert in hymns,
snp5.1:2.3: he lived on the bank of the Godhāvarī River,
snp5.1:2.4: getting by on gleanings and fruit.
snp5.1:3.3: With the revenue earned from there
snp5.1:4.1: When he had completed the great sacrifice,
snp5.1:4.2: he returned to his hermitage once more.
snp5.1:5.2: with grotty teeth and dusty head,
snp5.1:5.4: and asked for five hundred coins.
snp5.1:6.2: he invited him to sit down,
snp5.1:6.3: asked of his happiness and well-being,
snp5.1:7.4: I don’t have five hundred coins.”
snp5.1:8.4: let your head explode in seven!”
snp5.1:9.2: that charlatan uttered his dreadful curse.

snp5.1:10.3: And in such a state of mind,
snp5.1:12.2: about the head, he only wants money.
snp5.1:12.3: When it comes to heads or head-splitting,

snp5.1:13.3: Let me hear what you have to say
snp5.1:14.2: I have no knowledge in that matter.
snp5.1:14.3: When it comes to heads or head-splitting,
snp5.1:14.4: it is the Victors who have vision.”
snp5.1:16.2: the World Leader has gone forth.
snp5.1:16.3: He is a scion of King Okkāka,
snp5.1:16.4: a Sakyan, and he brings light.
snp5.1:17.1: For he, brahmin, is the Awakened One!
snp5.1:17.2: He has gone beyond all things;
snp5.1:17.3: he has attained to all knowledge and power;
snp5.1:17.4: he is the seer into all things,
snp5.1:17.5: he has attained the end of all deeds;
snp5.1:17.6: he is freed with the ending of attachments.
snp5.1:18.1: That Buddha, the Blessed One in the world,
snp5.1:19.4: and he was filled abundant joy.
snp5.1:20.4: or in what land is the protector of the world,
snp5.1:20.5: where we may go and pay respects
snp5.1:20.6: to the Awakened One, best of men?”
snp5.1:21.1: “Near Sāvatthī, the seat of the Kosalans, is the Victor
snp5.1:21.2: abounding in wisdom, vast in intelligence.
snp5.1:21.3: That Sakyan is indefatigable, free of defilements, a bull among men:
snp5.1:22.2: brahmins who had mastered the hymns:
snp5.1:23.1: Today has arisen in the world
snp5.1:23.2: one whose appearance in the world
snp5.1:23.4: he is renowned as the Awakened One.
